description.value:
Very Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Failing Toughness test, if target takes Impact/Explosive damage, runs, falls, or is knocked prone, makes -10 Toughness Test or take 1d10 E Damage to body (ignores armour/toughness). Lasts forever, or until medical treatment to cleanse/replace blood.

Requirements

Good Craftsmanship can delay effect by 1 round, Best can delay by up to 24 hours, chosen on acquisition/creation. Temporarily replaces the "Toxic" Wep. Quality's effect if applied.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
